ygData.subject: Re: TWINKING-- a discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont mind twinking as long as its not rediculous...the level 2 warrior in full plate thing is too far. Sometimes I feel like a twink because of stuff that I
ygData.messageBody:
I dont mind twinking as long as its not
rediculous...the level 2 warrior in full plate thing is too far.
Sometimes I feel like a twink because of stuff that I am
given but really that is how life works. You get
something new and you give your old stuff away, either to a
guild mate maybe or to one of your other characters. I
dont like the EC market and wonder how some of these
ppl get the items they sell.<br>As for the ability to
use certain items, that sort of exists now. Example,
being a Shadow Knight myself one of my guild mates
found a Dark Reaver and gave it to me. I can use the
sword but being lvl22 only it wont proc steal strength
for me yet. I get the message "your will is not
strong enough to control this weapon". But the sword is
still cool to have.<br>As for the sex thing, sometimes
I wonder how ppl take a perfectly good game and
turn it into a soap opera! I mean, getting married and
stuff? Give me a break!<br>Also I know a lot of players
who play opposite gender characters. Most of the guys
play girls because other players tend to walk up and
give you stuff more, and are more willing to help you.
I think the girls play guys to keep from getting
hit on so much. I though could never play a female
character, it would just be too weird for me.<br>Well enough
rambling, I guess I also fit into the techie thing being an
engineer, we are just not right.<br><br>Uinan
D'Mortuus<br>22nd Season SK of Erolissi Marr
